keywords.DESCRIPTION: #yTrap only triggers its effect when conditions are met.
Creatures with #ySeriousInjury effect receive 50% extra damage from #ynon-attack sources.
End the current turn and immediately take an extra turn, where in the new turn: NL - Retain your block. NL - Gain energy equal to your current energy count.
When Hinamizawa Syndrome reaches: NL #yLV3: This enemy deals damage to all enemies when attacking. NL #yLV5: This enemy loses half of its current health at the start of its turn.
Make the cost of your next attack card be 0.
